00023 #include <Terme_Boussinesq_base.h>
00024 #include <Motcle.h>
00025 #include <Convection_Diffusion_std.h>
00026 #include <Fluide_base.h>
00027 
00028 Implemente_base(Terme_Boussinesq_base,"Terme_Boussinesq_base",Source_base);
00029 
00030 ////!< printOn
00031 Sortie& Terme_Boussinesq_base::printOn(Sortie& s ) const
00032 {
00033   return s << que_suis_je() ;
00034 }
00035 
00036 ////!< readOn
00037 Entree& Terme_Boussinesq_base::readOn(Entree& s )
00038 {
00039   return lire_donnees(s);
00040 }
00041 
00042 // Description :
00043 // Cherche dans le probleme l'equation scalaire
00044 void Terme_Boussinesq_base::associer_pb(const Probleme_base& pb)
00045 {
00046   int ok=0;
00047   int n_eq=pb.nombre_d_equations();
00048   for (int eq=0; eq<n_eq; eq++)
00049     {
00050       const Equation_base& eqn=pb.equation(eq);
00051       if (eqn.inconnue().le_nom()==NomScalaire_)
00052         {
00053           ok=1;
00054           equation_scalaire_ = ref_cast(Convection_Diffusion_std,eqn);
00055         }
00056     }
00057   if (ok==0)
00058     {
00059       Cerr << "Error. The Boussinesq source term can't be defined on a problem of kind " << pb.que_suis_je() << finl;
00060       Process::exit();
00061     }
00062 
00063 // Fill la_gravite_ and beta_ attributes
00064   const Fluide_base& fluide=ref_cast(Fluide_base,equation().milieu());
00065   la_gravite_=fluide.gravite();
00066 
00067 // this variable indicates if the beta field is valid or not
00068   int valid_beta_field = 0; //!< by default it is invalid
00069   Nom beta_field_name="??"; //!< only used for the error message
00070 
00071   if (NomScalaire_=="temperature")
00072     {
00073       valid_beta_field = fluide.beta_t( ).non_nul( );
00074       beta_field_name = "thermal expansion value (beta_th)";
00075       beta_=fluide.beta_t();
00076     }
00077   else if (NomScalaire_=="concentration")
00078     {
00079       valid_beta_field = fluide.beta_c( ).non_nul( );
00080       beta_field_name = "volume expansion coefficient values in concentration (beta_co)";
00081       beta_=fluide.beta_c();
00082     }
00083 
00084   if( ! valid_beta_field )
00085     {
00086       Cerr << "Error. Boussinesq source term is not able to access to the "<<beta_field_name<<" associated to the fluid."<<finl;
00087       Cerr << "Please check your data file. " << finl;
00088       Cerr << "Aborting..."<<finl;
00089       Process::abort( );
00090     }
00091 
00092 }
00093 
00094 // Fonction de lecture d'un Parser_U
00095 void read(Entree& is, Parser_U& fct_Scalaire0_)
00096 {
00097   Nom expression;
00098   is >> expression;
00099   String2 ss(expression.getChar());
00100   fct_Scalaire0_.setNbVar(1);
00101   fct_Scalaire0_.setString(ss);
00102   fct_Scalaire0_.addVar("t");
00103   fct_Scalaire0_.parseString();
00104 }
00105 
00106 //
00107 //! Lit les parametres du terme source a partir d'un flot d'entree.
00108 Entree& Terme_Boussinesq_base::lire_donnees(Entree& is)
00109 {
00110   Cerr << "Reading Boussinesq source term parameters." << finl;
00111   Motcle accolade_ouverte("{");
00112   Motcle accolade_fermee("}");
00113   Motcle motlu;
00114   verif_=1;
00115 
00116   Motcles les_mots(3);
00117   {
00118     les_mots[0]="T0";
00119     les_mots[1]="C0";
00120     les_mots[2]="verif_boussinesq";
00121   }
00122 
00123   is >> motlu;
00124   if (motlu != accolade_ouverte)
00125     {
00126       Cerr << "Error: { is waited instead of " << motlu << finl;
00127       Process::exit();
00128     }
00129   is >> motlu;
00130 
00131   while (motlu!= accolade_fermee)
00132     {
00133       int rang = les_mots.search(motlu);
00134       switch(rang)
00135         {
00136         case 0 :
00137           {
00138 // Temperature
00139             NomScalaire_="temperature";
00140             fct_Scalaire0_.dimensionner(1);
00141             Scalaire0_.resize(1);
00142             read(is, fct_Scalaire0_[0]);
00143             break;
00144           }
00145         case 1 :
00146           {
00147 // Concentration
00148             NomScalaire_="concentration";
00149             int dim;
00150             is >> dim;
00151             fct_Scalaire0_.dimensionner(dim);
00152             Scalaire0_.resize(dim);
00153             for (int i=0; i<dim; i++)
00154               read(is, fct_Scalaire0_[i]);
00155             break;
00156           }
00157         case 2 :
00158           {
00159             is >> verif_;
00160             break;
00161           }
00162         default :
00163           {
00164             Cerr << "Error: " << motlu << " is not recognized." << finl;
00165             Cerr << "Possible keywords:" << finl;
00166             Cerr << les_mots << finl;
00167             Process::exit();
00168           }
00169 
00170         }
00171       is >> motlu;
00172     }
00173   return is;
00174 }
